reviews.customers_say: Customers find this turtleneck to be a great wardrobe basic with a nice heavy cotton material that's light enough to layer.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Well made and comfortable to wear.
items.body: Very nice material and it looks well on. Not too thick of material, nor tight fitting. Cute, yet subtle, design. Have worn it a couple of times now. Happy I made the purchase. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Layering Piece
items.body: I’m thrilled beyond expectations! The fabric is silky, soft and comfortable. The neck is not restrictive like bulky turtlenecks. The ivory color looks great layered under sweaters and tops. It fits true to size and, thankfully, the sleeve length is perfect. Read more
items.author: Veronicat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great turtleneck
items.body: This is a high quality item. Nice material that drapes nicely. The turtleneck is not a standard turtleneck but rests nicely and loosely at the neck. Several colors are available. I bought two. They are perfect for layering with the newer jackets that seem to have slender sleeves. Read more
items.author: Pacific Northwest

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Medium runs tight.
items.body: Perfect for layering, as after machine washing and drying as directed the side seems were a little off. Love the fabric and the feel. The Large Petite is a perfect fit. As the Med ran very tight and I returned it. Read more
items.author: MARLENE F PROIETTA

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars It is true to size, made with great material and workmanship
items.body: Very warm at lightweight Read more
items.author: Susanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and comfy
items.body: I like the soft material and the size small fits me well. I bought 2 different colors. Read more
items.author: Tigranuhi

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Cheap quality of fabric
items.body: While the shipment arrived very quickly, the shirt’s fabric is disappointing. It is thinner and not silky feeling. Definitely not up to the quality of other LandsEnd clothing. Read more
items.author: Julia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect wardrobe addition
items.body: Love this turtleneck, it is light weight, good sizing, very comfortable and the color is vibrant, I will be ordering more colors Read more
items.author: Nancy Clarke

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Light Raspberry Sorbet, Ivory Encircle Geo, Soft Jade, Estate Green Heather, Black/Cobalt Tiny Floral, Black, Dark Clay Animal Spots, Olive Drab, Light Emerald Blackwatch Plaid, Black Multi Floral, Pink Opal, Deep Sea/Cyan Stripe, Light Toffee Heather, Bermuda Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
